name: Trava
description: Trava (TVA) is a next-generation digital currency designed for real-world transactions, enabling workers, families, and investors to send, spend, and grow value globally. With a name rooted in trade and valor, Trava empowers everyday users and professional markets alike.

Trava (TVA) is a multi-utility digital token powering a decentralized ecosystem for esports betting, a P2E gaming platform, and an NFT-based multi-level referral program. It enables secure, real-world payments and incentivized participation within the Trava network.
